description:
The Crown room allows but Hikaru and eagle to enter but who will be able to handle or touch the crown to determine the new Pillar?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Qui sera le nouveau Pilier ? Hikaru ou Eagle ?
Shin no Hashira wa!? Hikaru ka, Eagle ka!?
Who Is the True Pillar!? Hikaru, or Eagle!?
真の柱は!? 光か, イーグルか!?
